article_title: Comedian Reginald D Hunter apologises after antisemitism row
sentence: More  than  40,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  the  ongoing  Israeli  campaign  in  Gaza,  according  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Comedian Reginald D Hunter apologises after antisemitism row
sentence: The  Israeli  offensive  came  after  Hamas-led  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people  in  an  attack  on  Israel  on  7  October,  capturing  251  others  as  hostages.
